page.title: 03COMMUNITY COUNCIL
page.content: We spoke to Mr.W.Morrison,chairman of the Community Council. The eight member committee meets every two months.Its purpose is to find out what people regard as{improvements to {the town}and then make these known to the{Regional Council}in{Dundee.}The Community Council itself does not have any power. The present issues are the{redesign of {The Square,repairing the bank of the {River Tay}and{buying a piano for the {Town Hall.} The committee have limited funds and have to raise money required through raffles and concerts.
